title: The Best Pilates Clothes to Wear to Class, According to an Expert
description: Be the best dressed at your next Pilates session.
excerpt: A Pilates expert shared what she looks for in a perfect class ’fit and we found the best pieces to shop according to her advice, including Vuo
text: Best LeggingsLululemon Align High-Rise PantHagag’s go-to Pilates piece is the Align legging from Lululemon. “Align’s buttery smooth fabric fits like a glove on the body and has a high waist that keeps everything in place,” she said. “I love this combination because it offers complete freedom of movement, keeps everything smooth and organized, and highlights the body’s lines, which is especially helpful for checking and correcting form during workouts.”Sizes available: 0-20, inseam length 23-31”Materials: 81% Nylon, 19% Lycra® elastaneDesigned for: Workout and leisureCustomer review: “These are by far my favorite leggings. They are super soft, stay put, and the quality is well worth the cost.”Best Tank TopGymshark Elevate TankIt’s important to have fitted clothing in Pilates, but if you don’t want to only wear a sports bra and leggings, opt for a tight tank top with built-in support and moisture-wicking fabric.Sizes available: XS-2XL Materials: 75% Recycled Nylon, 25% ElastaneDesigned for: Workouts or leisureAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest BodysuitVuori Bondi JumpsuitA fitted bodysuit is a great way to feel snatched before and especially after a butt-kicking class, but it’s also helpful for instructors to be able to make corrections as needed.Sizes available: XS-XLMaterials: 72% Polyester, 28% ElastaneDesigned for: Workouts or leisureCustomer review: “I love this jumpsuit so much!!! It’s comfortable and perfect for working out - but also so very flattering. I am in love!”Best Minimal BraBeyond Yoga Spacedye Slim Racerback BraA simple, classic sports bra is always my go-to for any workout class, but especially Pilates. Too many straps or cutouts can be a hassle to get on and off. You’re already attending what some call an exercise of torture, why make it any more complicated?Sizes available: XS-XLMaterials: 87% Polyester, 13% Elastane, UV protectedDesigned for: Medium supportCustomer review: “I could live in this set is so comfortable. Perfect for Pilates.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Grip SocksAlo Yoga Pulse Grip Sock“One thing I’d love to see more people prioritize is grip socks,” Hagag said. “At my studio, grip socks are required—not only for safety, as they prevent slipping on equipment like the Reformer or Cadillac, but also for improving stability.” These from Alo have the perfect amount of grip and also won’t slide down throughout your workout.Sizes available: 5-11 Materials: Combed terry cotton, nylon, lycraDesigned for: Pilates or barre workoutsCustomer review: “They’re just perfect I love it!!! And the grip is really good for yoga and Pilates.”Best Warm-Up TopSplits59 Shiri Airweight ShrugEspecially in transitional or colder months, you need a pre/post-workout top with sleeves to keep you comfortable while you warm up. If you’re like me though, you hate the thought of putting anything on after a workout, so a shrug that covers just the right areas (and happens to match the rest of your ’fit) is perfect.Sizes available: XS-XLMaterials: 81% nylon, 19% spandexDesigned for: Yoga, barre, Pilates, danceCustomer review: “Fits perfectly without the fabric being too clingy.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest High-Waisted LeggingsAdanola Ultimate Wrap Over LeggingsI’m always picky about the waistband of my leggings, so a design that creates at least the illusion of a wrapped, snatched waist is always nice to have. Sizes available: 2XS-3XL, regular and tall inseamMaterials: 70% Recycled Polyamide, 30% ElastaneDesigned for: Workouts or leisure Customer review: “Really soft and comfy. The wrap-over stays put, too. Bought with the matching t-shirt and love it.”Best Plunge BraVictoria's Secret VSX Elevate Refined Contours Plunge BraFor a bra top that will make you feel sculpted and supported, go with VSX’s plunge bra with fibers that adapt to your size and shape.Sizes available: XS-2XLMaterials: 82% Polyamide 18% LYCRA ADAPTIV ElastaneDesigned for: Low-impact workouts, light support Customer review: “Great style and design. Super comfortable for Pilates class. Will definitely buy another set.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Post-Workout TopZengjo Long Sleeve TopA perfect warm-up or post-workout top, this lightweight and adjustable tee will go with any workout set. Sizes available: XS-XLMaterials: 50% viscose, 45% polyester, 5% spandexDesigned for: Workouts or leisureCustomer review: “Very comfy and soft for yoga. I will be buying more colors!”Best Extra Stitch DesignAlo Yoga Alosoft High-Waist Sunray Legging“In Pilates classes, I often see Nofar Method clients choosing athleisure that prioritizes comfort and flexibility,” said Hagag. “These are excellent options because they allow a full range of motion and make it easier for instructors like me to check alignment and muscle engagement, which is so important for maintaining proper form.” Sizes available: 2XS-LMaterials: 87% Polyester, 13% ElastaneDesigned for: Workouts or leisureCustomer review: “Perfect fit! Comfy and attractive. Fabric is substantial but not too thick.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest HeadbandGolden Butter Exert Slim HeadbandAn important, yet often overlooked, element of a Pilates outfit is a good headband. As someone with unruly hair, especially during workouts, a sweat-wicking and reliable cloth headband is essential when I’m up and down and moving around.Materials: 80% nylon, 20% elastaneBest Workout ShortsLululemon Align High-Rise ShortIf you prefer working out in shorts vs. full-length leggings, try the shorter version of Hagag’s favorite Lululemon style. Sizes available: 0-20Materials: 80% Nylon, 20% Lycra® elastaneDesigned for: Workouts or leisure Customer review: “Feels like butter and are perfect for everything everyday. My favorite item to wear!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Performance SocksToesox Full Toe Elle Grip SocksThere are classic grippy socks, then there are grippy toe socks. Some people prefer the toe design for stability and flexibility, so if you’re really serious about your performance, give them a whirl.Sizes available: 6-13Materials: 74% Organic Cotton, 19% Polyester, 3% Nylon, 4% Other FiberDesigned for: Yoga, Pilates, barreCustomer review: “I LOVE these grip socks! They are absolutely adorable! So much fun to wear during the holiday season. They have great grip. They fit well. They perform well during my Pilates practice.”Best Workout CapriAthleta Pacesetter Ultra High Rise CropYou’ve seen fashion capris make a comeback, now’s the time for workout capris. Get all the benefits of a sculpting legging with the coolness of a shorter inseam. Sizes available: 2XS-XLMaterials: 77% Recycled Polyester, 23% ElastaneDesigned for: Workouts or leisureCustomer review: “Great fit! They feel like silk! I don't like full leggings to work out in because my legs get too hot. These are fantastic!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Transitional One-PieceFP Movement Good Karma OnesieAnother bodysuit option, this FP Movement suit has perfectly-placed ribbing at the waist and breathable, lightweight fabric, perfect for light to medium-impact workouts.Sizes available: XS-XLMaterials: 73% Nylon, 27% SpandexDesigned for: Medium-impact workouts or leisureCustomer review: “This one piece makes me feel so confident and cute! Perfect for workouts, yoga, hiking, lounging, literally whatever!”Best Built-In BraSpanx Contour Crossback Shelf TankSpanx isn’t just for shapewear, it’s to get you in shape, too! This workout top has an adjustable built-in bra for extra support, as well as moisture-wicking and UPF 50+ fabric suitable for any workout, anywhere.Sizes available: XS-3XLMaterials: 64% Nylon, 36% ElastaneDesigned for: Low-impact workoutsCustomer review: “Super soft, nice stretch and perfect fit. Very smoothing and keeps me in place during activities.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Color VarietyBeyond Yoga Midi LeggingsForm-fitting clothes are also important, considering the machinery and equipment used during Pilates classes. Try a classic legging from Beyond Yoga, available in any color you could wish for.Sizes available: 2XS-4XLMaterials: 87% polyester, 13% elastaneDesigned for: Workouts or leisure Customer review: “These are always great quality. They fit amazingly and the colors are so nice. I wash and dry mine like regular clothes all the time.”Best Short BodysuitSkims Mid Thigh OnesieFor those who want a shorter bodysuit style, try Skims’s ultra-sleek and simple style.Sizes available: 2XS-4XLMaterials: 74% Cotton, 18% Polyester, 8% ElastaneDesigned for: Low-impact workouts or leisure Customer review: “Super comfortable and breathable material! Hugged every inch of my body and the cup size was PERFECT for chest coverage.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Sculpting LeggingFanka Body Sculpt Power LeggingsIf you want extra support or compression, or you just want your butt to look amazing, try Fanka’s workout leggings. The special line designs are made to contour your muscles and support your knees, thighs, and glutes. Sizes available: S-XL Materials: LYCRA® FitSenseDesigned for: Running, workoutsCustomer review: “Not only are these leggings stylish, but they truly are body sculpting! And I feel so much more energetic wearing them. They look great on, and are very comfortable!”Best Classic TankThe Gym People Longline Sports BraFor a classic top that won’t get in the way of your workout, try The Gym People’s longline sports bra, which offers the support of a bra with the coverage of a tank top. Sizes available: XS-3XLMaterials: 80% Polyamide, 20% SpandexDesigned for: Workouts or leisureCustomer review: “So comfortable and sweatproof! I will be ordering more colors; can definitely wear this as a casual tank top too!”
html:
Best Leggings

Lululemon Align High-Rise Pant

Hagag’s go-to Pilates piece is the Align legging from Lululemon. “Align’s buttery smooth fabric fits like a glove on the body and has a high waist that keeps everything in place,” she said. “I love this combination because it offers complete freedom of movement, keeps everything smooth and organized, and highlights the body’s lines, which is especially helpful for checking and correcting form during workouts.”

Sizes available: 0-20, inseam length 23-31”

Materials: 81% Nylon, 19% Lycra® elastane

Designed for: Workout and leisure

Customer review: “These are by far my favorite leggings. They are super soft, stay put, and the quality is well worth the cost.”

Best Tank Top

Gymshark Elevate Tank

It’s important to have fitted clothing in Pilates, but if you don’t want to only wear a sports bra and leggings, opt for a tight tank top with built-in support and moisture-wicking fabric.

Sizes available: XS-2XL

Materials: 75% Recycled Nylon, 25% Elastane

Designed for: Workouts or leisure

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Bodysuit

Vuori Bondi Jumpsuit

A fitted bodysuit is a great way to feel snatched before and especially after a butt-kicking class, but it’s also helpful for instructors to be able to make corrections as needed.

Sizes available: XS-XL

Materials: 72% Polyester, 28% Elastane

Designed for: Workouts or leisure

Customer review: “I love this jumpsuit so much!!! It’s comfortable and perfect for working out - but also so very flattering. I am in love!”

Best Minimal Bra

Beyond Yoga Spacedye Slim Racerback Bra

A simple, classic sports bra is always my go-to for any workout class, but especially Pilates. Too many straps or cutouts can be a hassle to get on and off. You’re already attending what some call an exercise of torture, why make it any more complicated?

Sizes available: XS-XL

Materials: 87% Polyester, 13% Elastane, UV protected

Designed for: Medium support

Customer review: “I could live in this set is so comfortable. Perfect for Pilates.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Grip Socks

Alo Yoga Pulse Grip Sock

“One thing I’d love to see more people prioritize is grip socks,” Hagag said. “At my studio, grip socks are required—not only for safety, as they prevent slipping on equipment like the Reformer or Cadillac, but also for improving stability.” These from Alo have the perfect amount of grip and also won’t slide down throughout your workout.

Sizes available: 5-11

Materials: Combed terry cotton, nylon, lycra

Designed for: Pilates or barre workouts

Customer review: “They’re just perfect I love it!!! And the grip is really good for yoga and Pilates.”

Best Warm-Up Top

Splits59 Shiri Airweight Shrug

Especially in transitional or colder months, you need a pre/post-workout top with sleeves to keep you comfortable while you warm up. If you’re like me though, you hate the thought of putting anything on after a workout, so a shrug that covers just the right areas (and happens to match the rest of your ’fit) is perfect.

Sizes available: XS-XL

Materials: 81% nylon, 19% spandex

Designed for: Yoga, barre, Pilates, dance

Customer review: “Fits perfectly without the fabric being too clingy.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best High-Waisted Leggings

Adanola Ultimate Wrap Over Leggings

I’m always picky about the waistband of my leggings, so a design that creates at least the illusion of a wrapped, snatched waist is always nice to have.

Sizes available: 2XS-3XL, regular and tall inseam

Materials: 70% Recycled Polyamide, 30% Elastane

Designed for: Workouts or leisure

Customer review: “Really soft and comfy. The wrap-over stays put, too. Bought with the matching t-shirt and love it.”

Best Plunge Bra

Victoria's Secret VSX Elevate Refined Contours Plunge Bra

For a bra top that will make you feel sculpted and supported, go with VSX’s plunge bra with fibers that adapt to your size and shape.

Sizes available: XS-2XL

Materials: 82% Polyamide 18% LYCRA ADAPTIV Elastane

Designed for: Low-impact workouts, light support

Customer review: “Great style and design. Super comfortable for Pilates class. Will definitely buy another set.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Post-Workout Top

Zengjo Long Sleeve Top

A perfect warm-up or post-workout top, this lightweight and adjustable tee will go with any workout set.

Sizes available: XS-XL

Materials: 50% viscose, 45% polyester, 5% spandex

Designed for: Workouts or leisure

Customer review: “Very comfy and soft for yoga. I will be buying more colors!”

Best Extra Stitch Design

Alo Yoga Alosoft High-Waist Sunray Legging

“In Pilates classes, I often see Nofar Method clients choosing athleisure that prioritizes comfort and flexibility,” said Hagag. “These are excellent options because they allow a full range of motion and make it easier for instructors like me to check alignment and muscle engagement, which is so important for maintaining proper form.”

Sizes available: 2XS-L

Materials: 87% Polyester, 13% Elastane

Designed for: Workouts or leisure

Customer review: “Perfect fit! Comfy and attractive. Fabric is substantial but not too thick.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Headband

Golden Butter Exert Slim Headband

An important, yet often overlooked, element of a Pilates outfit is a good headband. As someone with unruly hair, especially during workouts, a sweat-wicking and reliable cloth headband is essential when I’m up and down and moving around.

Materials: 80% nylon, 20% elastane

Best Workout Shorts

Lululemon Align High-Rise Short

If you prefer working out in shorts vs. full-length leggings, try the shorter version of Hagag’s favorite Lululemon style.

Sizes available: 0-20

Materials: 80% Nylon, 20% Lycra® elastane

Designed for: Workouts or leisure

Customer review: “Feels like butter and are perfect for everything everyday. My favorite item to wear!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Performance Socks

Toesox Full Toe Elle Grip Socks

There are classic grippy socks, then there are grippy toe socks. Some people prefer the toe design for stability and flexibility, so if you’re really serious about your performance, give them a whirl.

Sizes available: 6-13

Materials: 74% Organic Cotton, 19% Polyester, 3% Nylon, 4% Other Fiber

Designed for: Yoga, Pilates, barre

Customer review: “I LOVE these grip socks! They are absolutely adorable! So much fun to wear during the holiday season. They have great grip. They fit well. They perform well during my Pilates practice.”

Best Workout Capri

Athleta Pacesetter Ultra High Rise Crop

You’ve seen fashion capris make a comeback, now’s the time for workout capris. Get all the benefits of a sculpting legging with the coolness of a shorter inseam.

Sizes available: 2XS-XL

Materials: 77% Recycled Polyester, 23% Elastane

Designed for: Workouts or leisure

Customer review: “Great fit! They feel like silk! I don't like full leggings to work out in because my legs get too hot. These are fantastic!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Transitional One-Piece

FP Movement Good Karma Onesie

Another bodysuit option, this FP Movement suit has perfectly-placed ribbing at the waist and breathable, lightweight fabric, perfect for light to medium-impact workouts.

Sizes available: XS-XL

Materials: 73% Nylon, 27% Spandex

Designed for: Medium-impact workouts or leisure

Customer review: “This one piece makes me feel so confident and cute! Perfect for workouts, yoga, hiking, lounging, literally whatever!”

Best Built-In Bra

Spanx Contour Crossback Shelf Tank

Spanx isn’t just for shapewear, it’s to get you in shape, too! This workout top has an adjustable built-in bra for extra support, as well as moisture-wicking and UPF 50+ fabric suitable for any workout, anywhere.

Sizes available: XS-3XL

Materials: 64% Nylon, 36% Elastane

Designed for: Low-impact workouts

Customer review: “Super soft, nice stretch and perfect fit. Very smoothing and keeps me in place during activities.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Color Variety

Beyond Yoga Midi Leggings

Form-fitting clothes are also important, considering the machinery and equipment used during Pilates classes. Try a classic legging from Beyond Yoga, available in any color you could wish for.

Sizes available: 2XS-4XL

Materials: 87% polyester, 13% elastane

Designed for: Workouts or leisure

Customer review: “These are always great quality. They fit amazingly and the colors are so nice. I wash and dry mine like regular clothes all the time.”

Best Short Bodysuit

Skims Mid Thigh Onesie

For those who want a shorter bodysuit style, try Skims’s ultra-sleek and simple style.

Sizes available: 2XS-4XL

Materials: 74% Cotton, 18% Polyester, 8% Elastane

Designed for: Low-impact workouts or leisure

Customer review: “Super comfortable and breathable material! Hugged every inch of my body and the cup size was PERFECT for chest coverage.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Sculpting Legging

Fanka Body Sculpt Power Leggings

If you want extra support or compression, or you just want your butt to look amazing, try Fanka’s workout leggings. The special line designs are made to contour your muscles and support your knees, thighs, and glutes.

Sizes available: S-XL

Materials: LYCRA® FitSense

Designed for: Running, workouts

Customer review: “Not only are these leggings stylish, but they truly are body sculpting! And I feel so much more energetic wearing them. They look great on, and are very comfortable!”

Best Classic Tank

The Gym People Longline Sports Bra

For a classic top that won’t get in the way of your workout, try The Gym People’s longline sports bra, which offers the support of a bra with the coverage of a tank top.

Sizes available: XS-3XL

Materials: 80% Polyamide, 20% Spandex

Designed for: Workouts or leisure

Customer review: “So comfortable and sweatproof! I will be ordering more colors; can definitely wear this as a casual tank top too!”
